Terrah Cobián
Strategic SaaS Marketer
February 28, 2017, Terrah was a client of Joe’s

I had the pleasure of working with Terrah during her time with CreditSuppliers. Terrah was the head of marketing and the direct contact for my agency, Bigfish, as we worked through many projects and initiatives for CreditSuppliers. In my time working with her, I became immensely impressed with the skills and business acumen that Terrah displayed. Terrah is force of nature, moving mountains in order to get things done. She is bright, driven, and straightforward – something that is lacking in much of today’s business world. While Terrah is certainly a leader, she is also a great team player, acknowledging the expertise of those around her and seeking their input in project decisions and objectives. She is quick to praise the skills of others and give credit to team members for their work - the mark of a true leader. Not only myself, but my entire team, has enjoyed working with her and looks forward to the day that our paths cross again.

summary: Bigfish Creative Group is a full-service agency stocked with leading marketing strategists adept at integrating traditional advertising with digital marketing. We bring synchronized performance and measurability to complex and fragmented modern media.For your enjoyment, a story: Seasoned advertising veteran recognizes the opportunities of working on the agency side of marketing. He assembles some of the best strategic, creative and technology talent on the planet. His team brings out the best that brands have to offer, marketing success ensues, happily ever after. That’s our story and we’re definitely sticking to it. Bigfish Creative Group. Purposeful. Accountable. Effective.
